title: Bug 7734 - System can be shut down without save file warnings
OB: The system should provide a warning dialog box with options to save the file before shutting down.
EB: The system does not provide any warning dialog box for saving the file before shutting down.
SR: Add a feature to display a dialog box with options to save the file (Yes, No, Cancel) before initiating the shutdown process. Additionally, consider allowing applications to control the shutdown/save process or display their own windows to provide the option to stop the shutdown if the user chooses Cancel.
